Instruction: Preheat the oven to 325°F (165°C). Grease two 8x4-inch loaf pans.
Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a mixing bowl. Stir in the sour cream, raisins, and eggs until just mixed. Divide the batter equally between the two greased loaf pans.
Bake the loaves in the preheated oven for 1 hour or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
